title: The Week of Valor: Alice Collins Unveils Her Power
summary: Alice Collins, a 66-year-old retired actress and teacher, discovers her ability to manipulate time during a week filled with unique challenges and uses her power to help her community.
summaryGerman: Alice Collins, eine 66-jährige pensionierte Schauspielerin und Lehrerin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, die Zeit zu manipulieren, in einer Woche voller einzigartiger Herausforderungen und nutzt ihre Kraft, um ihrer Gemeinde zu helfen.
summaryDutch: Alice Collins, een 66-jarige gepensioneerde actrice en lerares, ontdekt haar vermogen om de tijd te manipuleren gedurende een week vol unieke uitdagingen en gebruikt haar kracht om haar gemeenschap te helpen.
summaryFrench: Alice Collins, une actrice et enseignante à la retraite de 66 ans, découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps durant une semaine remplie de défis uniques et utilise son pouvoir pour aider sa communauté.

story.text: Alice Collins feels a surge of energy as she stops a street accident in its tracks, literally freezing time to save a child.
Haunted by her newfound ability, Alice spends the day reflecting on her past roles and how they might have prepared her for this unexpected chapter.
Alice decides to embrace her power after a heartfelt discussion with her old theater group, who encourage her to see this as her new role in life.
Testing her limits, Alice tries to extend her time manipulation to help local farmers by extending the daylight, boosting their crop growth unexpectedly.
Alice teaches her granddaughter about the responsibilities that come with great power, blending her passions for acting and teaching into the lessons.
At a community event, Alice uses her abilities to create an impromptu play where she illustrates historical events in real-time, amassing a large, enchanted audience.
Reflecting on the week, Alice feels happy and empowered, knowing she can contribute to her community in new, meaningful ways.

ending: As the curtain falls on an extraordinary week, Alice Collins embraces her role as a real-life superhero, ready to act on any future challenges.
moral: No matter the stage of life, one can always find new ways to make an impact and redefine their purpose.
